name: magento-docker-setup
description: An automated Docker setup for Magento 2 with MySQL, Redis, Elasticsearch, and Nginx.

scripts.install: docker exec magento-php bash -c 'rm -f /var/www/html/install.sh' && docker cp ./install.sh magento-php:/var/www/html/install.sh && docker exec magento-php bash -c 'chmod +x /var/www/html/install.sh && sh /var/www/html/install.sh'
scripts.setup: npm run start && npm run install
scripts.restart: npm run stop && npm run start

author: Vinay Sikarwar
